sources.title: Clouds Over Europe
sources.description: Title: Clouds Over Europe Summary: A quirky British Secret Service Agent named Major Hammond tries to discover who is using a secret weapon to steal experimental planes. Directed by: Tim Whelan, Arthur B. Woods Actors: Production Company: Irving Asher Productions Release Date: 20 June 1939 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Experimental aircraft of several countries are mysteriously vanishing during test flights over the sea. The latest is British, and Hammond of the Secret Service, comical but competent, investigates undercover. Also interested is waitress Kay, a disguised reporter, and Hammond's sister. The government and plane manufacturer Barrett think the whole business is just coincidence, but the "Viking", ostensible salvage ship controlled by a foreign power, has much to do with it.

metadata.Writer: Brock Williams, Jack Whittingham, Arthur Wimperis
metadata.Actors: Laurence Olivier, Ralph Richardson, Valerie Hobson
